Foreign Currency Translation: other comprehensive income loss foreign currency transaction and translation adjustment net of tax
Other OCI: oci liability for future policy benefit gain loss after reclassification adjustment and tax
other comprehensive income loss pension and other postretirement benefit plans adjustment net of tax
Unrealized Gains/Losses on Securities: other comprehensive income loss available for sale securities including other than temporary impairment losses adjustment net of tax

Other Equity Adjustments: adjustments to additional paid in capital forward contract on accelerated share repurchase agreement
tax cuts and jobs act of2017 reclassification from aoci to retained earnings tax effect

Other Stock Issuance: stock issued during period value acquisitions
stock issued during period value employee stock ownership plan
stock issued during period value new issues
Stock-Based Compensation: adjustments to additional paid in capital sharebased compensation requisite service period recognition value
stock issued during period value share based compensation

Stock Repurchases: stock redeemed or called during period value
treasury stock value acquired cost method
__unmapped__: common stock dividends per share declared
net income loss attributable to noncontrolling interest
noncontrolling interest increase from capital transaction
